moscow_mule.name: moscow_mule
moscow_mule.preperation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a copper mug or highball glass. Stir gently

bloody_mary.name: bloody_mary
bloody_mary.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass

vodka_martini.name: vodka_martini
vodka_martini.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain in chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink

negroski.name: negroski
negroski.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a old-fashioned glass over ice

vesper.name: vesper
vesper.preperation: Shake over ice until well chilled, then strain into a deep goblet

the_quad.name: the_quad
the_quad.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled cocktail glass

white_russian.name: white_russian
white_russian.preperation: Pour coffee liqueur and vodka into an Old Fashioned glass filled with ice. Float fresh cream on top and stir slowly

cosmopolitan.name: cosmopolitan
cosmopolitan.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and double strain into a chilled cocktail glass

espresso_martini.name: espresso_martini
espresso_martini.preperation: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker, shake well with ice, strain into chilled cocktail glass

vodka_tonic.name: vodka_tonic
vodka_tonic.preperation: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add the vodka. Top with tonic water and gently stir

screwdriver.name: screwdriver
screwdriver.preperation: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add the vodka. Top with orange juice and gently stir. add 3 dashes of bitters

Caipiroska.name: Caipiroska
Caipiroska.preperation: Muddle the lemon wedges and brown sugar. Fill with ice. Add the vodka. Stir

old_fashioned.name: old_fashioned
old_fashioned.preperation: Place sugar in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey

boulevardier.name: boulevardier
boulevardier.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a old-fashioned glass over ice

whiskey_sour.name: whiskey_sour
whiskey_sour.preperation: Shake all ingredients without ice. Add ice and shake till well chilled. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass

whiskey_soda.name: whiskey_soda
whiskey_soda.preperation: Add the whiskey to a highball glass filled with ice,top with club soda and stir briefly to combine

whiskey_coke.name: whiskey_coke
whiskey_coke.preperation: Add the whiskey to a highball glass filled with ice,top with coke and stir briefly to combine

penicillin.name: penicillin
penicillin.preperation: Shaker all ingredients except the smoked whiskey with ice till well chilled, strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice. Top with smoked whiskey

whiskey_smash.name: whiskey_smash
whiskey_smash.preperation: Muddle the lemon wedges in a shaker, add the rest of the ingredients and shake till well chilled. Double strain into a rocks glass over ice

mint_julep.name: mint_julep
mint_julep.preperation: Muddle the mint and syrup in a Julep or highball glass, add the whiskey and fill with crushed ice. Stir

trinidad_sour.name: trinidad_sour
trinidad_sour.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice till well chilled. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass

rob_roy.name: rob_roy
rob_roy.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir till well chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass

toronto.name: toronto
toronto.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir till well chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass

sazerac.name: sazerac
sazerac.preperation: Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe, strain the into a chilled shot glass to be served at the side. Add the rest of the ingredients into a mixing with ice and stir till well chilled. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass

manhattan.name: manhattan
manhattan.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stirr till well chilled. Strain into a chilled coupe glass

irish_mule.name: irish_mule
irish_mule.preperation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a copper mug or highball glass. Stir gently

rusty_nail.name: rusty_nail
rusty_nail.preperation: Add the scotch and Drambuie into a mixing glass with ice and stir till well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over one large ice cube

clara_bow.name: clara_bow
clara_bow.preperation: Add all ingredients with ice and shake. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass

classic_martini.name: classic_martini
classic_martini.preperation: Add the gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink

wet_martini.name: wet_martini
wet_martini.preperation: Add the gin and dry vermouth into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass

dirty_martini.name: dirty_martini
dirty_martini.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass

50-50_birthday.name: 50-50_birthday
50-50_birthday.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

negroni.name: negroni
negroni.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a old-fashioned glass over ice

jasmin.name: jasmin
jasmin.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

basil_smash.name: basil_smash
basil_smash.preperation: Smash the basil leaves in the shaker. Add all ingredients with ice and shake vigorously. Double strain into an old-fashioned glass over ice

gin_fizz.name: gin_fizz
gin_fizz.preperation: Shake all ingredients except the soda without ice. Add ice and shake till well chilled. Double strain into an ice-filled collins glass and top with soda

ginger_gin_fizz.name: ginger_gin_fizz
ginger_gin_fizz.preperation: Shake all ingredients except the soda without ice. Add ice cubes and shake till well chilled. Double strain into a ice-filled collins glass and top with soda

gin_and_tonic.name: gin_and_tonic
gin_and_tonic.preperation: Fill a highball glass with ice, then add the gin. Top with tonic water and gently stir

pink_gin_and_tonic.name: pink_gin_and_tonic
pink_gin_and_tonic.preperation: Add the gin, lime juice and bitters into an highball filled with ice. Top with the tonic water and stir briefly

london_mule.name: london_mule
london_mule.preperation: Fill a copper mug with ice, then add the gin and lime juice. Top with the ginger beer and stir briefly

red_snapper.name: red_snapper
red_snapper.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass

pink_lady.name: pink_lady
pink_lady.preperation: Vigorously dry shake all ingredients. Add ice and shake till well chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

vesper.name: vesper
vesper.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a deep goblet

tom_collins.name: tom_collins
tom_collins.preperation: Add the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup to a Collins glass. Fill with ice, top with club soda and stir

killer_queen.name: killer_queen
killer_queen.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a coupe glass and spray flower water on top

french_75.name: french_75
french_75.preperation: Add the gin, lemon juice and simple syrup to a shaker with ice and shake until well chilled. Strain into a Champagne glass. Top with the Champagne

the_last_word.name: the_last_word
the_last_word.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass

gimlet.name: gimlet
gimlet.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled coupe glass

gin_cucumber_cooler.name: gin_cucumber_cooler
gin_cucumber_cooler.preperation: Muddle all ingredients except the tonic water. Shake vigorously and double strain into an ice-filled highball glass, top with tonic water. Stir

margarita.name: margarita
margarita.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

tequila_sunrise.name: tequila_sunrise
tequila_sunrise.preperation: Add the tequila to a highball glass filled with ice,fill with orange juice and top with grenadine which will sink to the bottom

bloody_maria.name: bloody_maria
bloody_maria.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled highball glass

oaxaca_old_fashioned.name: oaxaca_old_fashioned
oaxaca_old_fashioned.preperation: Add all ingredients to an old-fashioned galss over a large ice cube. stir

paloma.name: paloma
paloma.preperation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass over ice. stir

tequila_sour.name: tequila_sour
tequila_sour.preperation: Shake all ingredients without ice. Add ice and shake till well chilled. Strain into a chilled old-fashioned glass

mexican_mule.name: mexican_mule
mexican_mule.preperation: Pour all ingredients over ice in a copper mug or highball glass. Stir gently

el_diablo.name: el_diablo
el_diablo.preperation: Shake all ingredients except the ginger beer with ice. Pour over into an ice-filled highball glass and top with ginger beer. Stir

siesta.name: siesta
siesta.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

rosita.name: rosita
rosita.preperation: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well chilled. Strain into a old-fashioned glass over ice

dark_and_stormy.name: dark_and_stormy
dark_and_stormy.preperation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass over ice. stir

daiquiri.name: daiquiri
daiquiri.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass

pina_colada.name: pina_colada
pina_colada.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled Hurricane glass over crushed ice

mai_tai.name: mai_tai
mai_tai.preperation: Shake all ingredients exept the dark rum with ice and strain into a chilled double rocks glass or a higeball over ice. float the dark rum over the top

rum_sour.name: rum_sour
rum_sour.preperation: Shake all ingredients without ice. Add ice and shake till well chilled. Strain into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass

mojito.name: mojito
mojito.preperation: Lightly muddle the mint with the simple syrup in a highball glass. Add the rum, lime juice and ice and stir. Top with club soda

cuba_libre.name: cuba_libre
cuba_libre.preperation: Add all ingredients to a highball glass over ice. stir

zombie.name: zombie
zombie.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a chilled Hurricane glass over ice.

rum_old_fashioned.name: rum_old_fashioned
rum_old_fashioned.preperation: In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle the sugar and bitters. Add ice and rum, stir well.

rum_swizzle.name: rum_swizzle
rum_swizzle.preperation: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain into a highball glass over ice. Swizzle with a swizzle stick or stir gently
